framework.name: GDPR Audit Workflow
framework.description: Workflow-focused controls for GDPR audit readiness and accountability.

domains.name: Rights & Requests
domains.description: Handle data subject rights and requests.

controls.title: Accountability documentation
controls.summary_description: Maintain records that demonstrate GDPR accountability.
controls.implementation_guidance: Keep an up-to-date compliance register and audit trail.

suggested_task_templates.title: Update GDPR accountability register
suggested_task_templates.description: Review records of processing and compliance artifacts.

controls.title: Privacy governance roles
controls.summary_description: Define privacy roles, responsibilities, and escalation paths.
controls.implementation_guidance: Document responsibilities and ensure staffing coverage.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review privacy role assignments
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm accountability coverage for GDPR obligations.

controls.title: Records of processing
controls.summary_description: Maintain a record of processing activities for personal data.
controls.implementation_guidance: Track data categories, purpose, and retention.

suggested_task_templates.title: Update processing records
suggested_task_templates.description: Verify data processing activities and retention.

controls.title: Data minimization controls
controls.summary_description: Collect and retain only necessary personal data.
controls.implementation_guidance: Review data collection forms and retention schedules.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review data minimization
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate data collection against business need.

controls.title: Data subject request workflow
controls.summary_description: Respond to access, deletion, and correction requests on time.
controls.implementation_guidance: Document request intake, SLA tracking, and fulfillment.

suggested_task_templates.title: Audit data subject requests
suggested_task_templates.description: Review request SLAs and fulfillment evidence.

controls.title: Consent and lawful basis
controls.summary_description: Document lawful basis and consent records for processing.
controls.implementation_guidance: Track consent collection and withdrawal workflows.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review consent records
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate consent capture and withdrawal handling.

controls.title: Breach detection and triage
controls.summary_description: Detect incidents involving personal data and triage quickly.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain detection processes and incident logging.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review breach detection
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate detection coverage for personal data systems.

controls.title: Notification readiness
controls.summary_description: Prepare to notify regulators and affected parties within required timelines.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain notification templates and approval workflow.

suggested_task_templates.title: Test breach notification workflow
suggested_task_templates.description: Simulate breach notification approvals and timing.

controls.title: Vendor data processing agreements
controls.summary_description: Ensure vendors processing personal data have agreements in place.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain a vendor register and DPA status tracking.

controls.title: Cross-border transfer oversight
controls.summary_description: Assess safeguards for international data transfers.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review transfer safeguards
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate safeguards for cross-border data flows.
